name: In Season (Vyfrost)
description:
An upbeat farming simulator, in which the seasons shift every 10 seconds!

That damn Climate Change Wizard has cursed the world! What is a farmer to do, other than keep farming?

Plant your harvest with precise timing to earn enough money, and survive 15 years of this weather-sorcery!

Theme: Every 10 Seconds

Created in 72 Hours for Ludum Dare 51

Game Engine: Godot 3.5

Pixel-Art: Aseprite

Controls:

W A S D - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Use item

A Vyfrost Game

   -   Blue,  art   (instagram) 

   -   Hakuro,  programming

   -   feat. StoneTapeStudios,  music and sound design (website)

To keep up with more of our team's work, join the Vyfrost discord!
